name: Russian Bear Motorcycle Traffic Race
description:
All stereotypes about Russia are mixed in the crazy racing game called Russian Bear Motorcycle Traffic Race ! You know, in Russia bears are walking everywhere, but recently they learned driving! And now the most respected mr Bear wants to become a professional moto biker – let's help! Welcome back to USSR!

Rules of this russian traffic racer are really simple. You are the bear, and you are the driver. Drive your bike and avoid obstacles. Be careful and have fun!

Russian Bear Motorcycle Traffic Race game features:
• Motorbike racing 3D;
• Exciting atmosphere of crazy Russia with bears;
• Communist bear, wearing ushanka hat;
• Collect coins and unlock bonuses.

So, prepare your bike for a long absurd race – mix boring life of bear with some crazy adventures! Russian Bear Motorcycle Traffic Race – this game is not about policy, this games is about fun!
